name: Ghosty Ghost
description:
Ghosty Ghost 1.0 - Created by Jeremy Elder - @sgtcrispy
for Windows and Mac OSX
***************************************
Instructions:
Press spacebar to start game.
Arrow keys: Movement
Z key: Shoot.
ESC: Quit game.
The GUI:
Score in left upper corner.
Lives in upper right corner.
Shooting down baddies gives points for extra lives.
Extra life every 1000 points.
****************************************
Story: A few punks rampaged through the cemetary
and woke every one up!
It's up to shy ol'Mortimer to quite things down.
****************************************
Created for Halloween 2015 just of the fun of it.
www.itch.io/sgtcrispy
http://twitter.com/sgtcrispy

http://www.yoyogames.com/

Music made with SunVox:
http://www.warmplace.ru/soft/sunvox/

SFX made with Famitracker:
http://famitracker.com/

Colors are from Arne's 64 color Famicube palette:
http://www.androidarts.com/

Fonts are from Somepx:
http://somepx.itch.io/pixel-fonts
